title: Lagging with normal FPS / ping
body: Completely normal FPS and ping, yet I'm lagging like hell every game. This problem's been there since 2013 (apparently for a lot of people). Time for a fix, finally? :)

replies.body: so i have this problem,my pign is fine and fps is great. i have checked at the connection log reader site and i had  a packet loss of 0.06% so thats not the problem, and i had one lag psike of 120 ping but this was constantly happening througihout the game. Another thing is this only is happening in league. i have not had the problem anywhere else. {{item:3070}}

Based on the description you've given, I'd say it's likely you're experiencing packet loss.   We've actually just launched a new [Connection Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) which should be able to read your logs and help give a better idea of what's happening and what you can do to fix it.

Let me know if it helps and/or what you think!

And I'm sure your absolutely right.. If his experience is ANYTHING like mine since the last patch.. Your unable to play whatsoever.. packet loss can be upwards of 40%.. You can't play like that and none of your "common" solutions work

Keep in mind, if none of the "common" solutions work, it's a good indication the problem is coming from poor routing or problematic nodes along your route to the game servers. Nothing Riot has done with patches or Peering could have caused this. You'll want to reach out to your ISP and ask they look into your route from your home to the League servers and find the issue. Alternatively, you can reach out to Riot Support and request them to take a look at your network setup (first be sure to already be on optimal settings as per the connection KB) then they can have you run some traceroutes to see exactly where the packet loss is happening. 

Keep in mind, the solution here is your ISP's investigating and resolving the issue on their end. GL on the rift!
